section.title: RLS module (Resource Lists Server)
section.para: Resource lists server is a server which allows subscriptions to lists of users. Its behaviour is defined in and . As described there, it uses XCAP server for storing data about lists of users. These data can be manipulated in any way by user's client software.

section.title: Authorization (not done yet!)
section.para: RLS module uses implicit authorization rules now. Only user xyz can subscribe to xyz-list resource list.

section.title: Standard incompatibility
section.para:
There is a few of standard incompliances:
only internal subscriptions - at this moment are supported only internal subscriptions to PA module. Module can not handle subscriptions to external presence servers.

listitem.para: DB authorization (presence rules like in XCAP stored in local DB)
reaction on failed NOTIFY (408, ...) as soon as will be corrected req_within
storing subscriptions into db and reloading on startup (in subscription_manager)
